text: Babandi (abamalayika) bateruye intebe y’ubwami (Arshi) n’abayikikije, basingiza ikuzo rya Nyagasani wabo bakanamwemera, bakanasabira imbabazi ba bandi bemera (bagira bati) "Nyagasani wacu! Impuhwe n’ubumenyi byawe byageze kuri buri kintu. None babarira ibyaha babandi bakwicujijeho, bakanakurikira inzira yawe ndetse unabarinde ibihano byo mu muriro
